Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150
Reviews.Author: FER
Reviews.Content: Very impressive point and shoot camera at a reasonable price.  Zoom is very impressive (18X optical 5X digital).  Lots of features.

Reviews.Title: An Annie Oakley sharpshooter
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for everyday use. Only negative so far is that I can only upload one photo at a time to the computer but that is probably just me.  Maybe I can get the grandson to show me how to dump all the photos at once.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera.
Reviews.Author: sasidhar
Reviews.Content: Simply superb. Got this camera on father's day deal.. So happy with the output.. The optical zoom is just outstanding..i used this camera in stadium during white sox match.. i have taken the pictures of players from the long distance by using zoom and output is awesome.. photos came like as i have the pictures by standing beside the players..Loved the product , thumbsup.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the family
Reviews.Author: Donald Forbes
Reviews.Content: If your looking for that perfect grab, snap and go camera that anyone in the family can use this might just be it.  Not too expensive, great pictures and easy to use.  Plus with the bundle there is nothing else you will need.  I bought it for my wife but I like it too.  My 9 year old also can just pick it up and snap away.

Reviews.Title: Wifi is soo 2004
Reviews.Author: Gregory Dillon "warm hat"
Reviews.Content: I'm hoping for software updates that will make it easier to control the camera from my phone, and easier to transfer photos to more cloud locations.  Those features exist on this camera but in a clunky way.With today' phone camera's getting so good, who want's a dedicated camera any more?  This camera trys to be the answer that question, but the result is not enough.  While this camera is good, the wifi connection is still too hard for any but the serious gadgeter.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Barry Rosenberger
Reviews.Content: Great product and great service, will buy anytime again from these guys! Everything came in the box you needed including the battery which wasn't listed

Reviews.Title: Great Price great camera
Reviews.Author: Jim Fishback
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife and so far she likes it. Simple enough for her to use yet has some tech options that I find cool. The remote viewpoint app for a cell phone is pretty neat. No more using the timer and running back for the shot of the picture! The camera has a lot more manual controls than I realized. So far the only negatives I can come up with are we have not been able to take good pictures of people in motion but that is probably due to us being novices with photography and the camera bag that came with the bundle is tiny.

Reviews.Title: Rear LCD screen torn
Reviews.Author: Mark Cardinal
Reviews.Content: Significant portion of the LCD was blacked out due to manufacturing defect. Other than that, solid point-and-shoot camera with good zoom.

Reviews.Title: nice and easy to manage
Reviews.Author: Florin Halbac
Reviews.Content: Not the best, but a very good camera for who want to start enjoy making foto.  4 stars for :-easy to use- very friendly presentation on desktop-a lot of functions- good quallity of materials- a frendly shape ....good luck samsumg!!!tks a lot!

Reviews.Title: Great camera---lots of features
Reviews.Author: Michael Mutter
Reviews.Content: We love this camera.  It has many features that more expensive cameras have.  It exceeds our needs and expectations!  We love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Mind-blowing Price
Reviews.Author: Marvin S. Nelson
Reviews.Content: OK, first of all, this is a Samsung, should I say anymore?!?!  This package and this price was the best I could find anywhere.  It was much more at Walmart and Target, and at the military Xchange, it was close to the same price, but with out the package deal  I don't think you can go wrong buying this camera.  Did I mention it was a Samsung :)

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: Linda Watts
Reviews.Content: It was everything I wanted and then some at a price that could not be found anywhere else.  Great service.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Roxanna Giddens
Reviews.Content: I received my camera yesterday! I love this camera already! It is going to be great to take on my vacation this summer. I bought it to use on vacation to post pictures to Facebook. I have already used the wi-fi and found it easy to operate. The zoom on this camera is also great! I highly recommend this camera if you want a great point and shoot camera. It works for me!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Slamron
Reviews.Content: The Wifi is cumbersome, slow to connect, slow in transmitting data.Focusing is slow compared to my Nikon D600. The photos are good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Robin Alden
Reviews.Content: Really like this camera ,takes good pictures quick shutter speed which I like, nice u can put pictures on Facebook right from the camera, love it , good price

Reviews.Title: Great feature set, good value, WiFi, only average image quality
Reviews.Author: Bron "Bron"
Reviews.Content: 2013-02-16 Numerous updates and edits made below.I will come back and update this review with more details as I have more time with the camera, but first impressions are good for the price paid (~130).  It is of plasticky construction, but solid and the build quality seems good.  No printed manual, but the manual (PDF) is on the CD and is quite detailed.  You can read on your PC. Tablet, or other device or print it out if you like.The big question for many seems to be the WiFi.  I have a pretty standard wifi setup and I had no problems at all.  I selected my network, chose the shared setting, entered the password (easy) and it connected right away.  No need to even read the manual, just turn the dial to WiFi and you can probably figure it out if you have set up many devices before.  Once this was done, I was able to easily upload images to my SkyDrive after entering my login info, again easy to do.  I was also able to email photos to my email account.  Transfers were quick (normal wifi transfer speeds) for the 4-6 images I tested with.  If you try to transfer 500 images it's going to take awhile, probably better to just remove the SD card and use your SD card reader (or plug the camera up via USB).  But for casual transfers of images it works fine.  So the Wifi was easy to setup and use in my opinion and works well.  USB->PC transfers were also easy and fast.  And, of course, you can pop out the SD card and use your PC card reader or external USB reader as well.Update: Also tested PC Autobackup via wifi which transfers all pictures from your camera to your PC.  This is the most efficient wifi mode and also preserves the image size and quality.  Many of the other modes (like SkyDrive, social media choices, compress the file size).  You have to install the software on your PC from the CD (which also contains the manual and Intelli-Studio software) and pair once via USB.  After that you can use the PC Autobackup option from the WiFi menu on the camera and everything works automatically and efficiently. You can also transfer pictures selectively while browsing via the playback menu.  In general, all of the wifi options I have tried have worked well.  There was one instance where a transfer "stalled" but when restarted it completed fine and there were no further issues.Update: In further use AutoBackup has worked fast and without any problems.  It is definitely the best mode for saving your images off the camera via Wifi.  You always have the option of using the USB connection or removing the card, but AutoBackup works well enough that I don't see any need for that unless some circumstances preclude it. This mode tracks what you have transferred and will only transfer new images/videos - nice!  Transfers are placed in a dated folder, also nice.The camera handles well.  The Menus and controls are OK and easy to use.  Full manual settings are available which is nice at this price point. SMART mode seems to work OK. Everything works pretty much like you'd expect.  Zoom toggle is a bit small, but it worked OK.PQ Update: Images look soft and a bit low contrast.  Picture quality seems about average for a P&S; travel zoom camera.  Colors are good, saturation on the lower end compared to many.  The biggest issue seems to be the aggressive noise reduction (due to the small sensor size) which smears details and causes a loss of sharpness. Contrast also seems low.  The end result is the pictures do not have the "zing" that most out of camera jpegs have these days, so many will be disappointed in the image quality, I think.  It is possible to add some color saturation, sharpness and contrast, but the loss of detail due to the small, budget sensor cannot be "fixed." That said, apparent image quality when viewing at normal screen and print sizes is OK and this may not be a big issue for some people.  This is not a DSLR.  At this price, the quality is acceptable, and images can be tweaked in any decent editor (though the lost detail cannot be recovered). For casual use, I think it is OK.  I've seen other cameras in this price range with very similar issues.  The noise reduction smearing of small detail is the biggest negative, so if you like crisp details, this will not be a good choice for you.So, picture quality is acceptable, but not stellar.  With a bit of care, good images are possible and the wifi and other features are unique at this price level. Decide if you can live with that in exchange for the other fun features offered.  In casual use, most people are not going to notice a lot of this.  Enthusiasts will.The many various modes, scenes, and effects are all a fun plus.  The "live panorama" mode worked very well in my few tests so far.  I was quite impressed, actually.  I found the camera fun to use.  There is built in help that explains most of the choices on screen and the controls are well thought out (for the most part) and easy to figure out and use.So far, it looks like a decent deal at the current price.  Comes with battery, charger, USB cable, CD, and wrist strap, but no SD card.2013-02-16 Update: Video -  Surprise!  The relative quality of the videos are pretty good.  The 30fps 720p HD (1260x720) video tests I took looked pretty good.  Good color, saturation, contrast, and detail (for video) and all in all very acceptable.  The videos also transferred fine via AutoBackup over wifi, thought they take longer due to much larger file sizes.  Having an 18x optical zoom that works in video mode is a nice plus, too, and it works pretty well.  The video is as good or better than a lot of the small portable video cams I have used and they're in the mp4 format so almost all devices should be able to handle them well.  Sound is mono (as usual for low price cam video) but decent. So we have a bit of a "sleeper" here if you like to shoot video as well as stills.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Happy with the camera.  The camera takes good quality photos and is easy to use.  Sometimes I wish I could change the mode to something specific instead of the "smart" mode.  I guess I could do a custom setting if I knew more about it all (just want something to take pictures quickly so I don't miss my kids "in the moment" since they move so fast!!)  The wi-fi function sounds better than it truly is, it's not really worth it in my opinion, too time consuming.

Reviews.Title: Wifi Camera
Reviews.Author: praveen
Reviews.Content: VERY VERY NICE camera .. go for it..wireless with kool features like smart choice to click point-n-shootand long zoom facility as well.semi-android based.should be little cheaper

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Julieta Martinez
Reviews.Content: I was looking a new digital camara. I found this great deal with a remarkable brand with plus. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price paid
Reviews.Author: Louis Beldotti
Reviews.Content: Very nice and affordable bundle.  WiFi is a bit slow and wish that it had a touch screen but overall very good.

Reviews.Title: arrived a little bit late.....
Reviews.Author: Roberto Arteaga
Reviews.Content: it arrived a few days late ,but everything was as expected....good jobi will recommend to my friends and yes i will keep doing business with them....

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: ygny fuentes
Reviews.Content: Very nice features, I am finding every day more and more uses for ther camera.I fgind very useful hr remote control trough the smartphone.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Dayna
Reviews.Content: I don't know why it's not as good as i check it in store. I love it's smart system to chose shooting mode automatically. The color is not as good as other name brands. It performs especially weak at night.  But the feature of long focus is worth this price.

Reviews.Title: RECIBIDO
Reviews.Author: Adelis Alvarado
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE VENDEDOR REALIZARE MAS COMPRAS EN EL FUTURO, QUEDE SATISFECHO CON EL PRODUCTO Y HARE RECOMENDACIONES A TODOS LOS AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Bernor Matamoros Picado
Reviews.Content: TREMENDA CAMARA MI HIJA ESTA SUPER FELIZ CON ELLA Y LAS FOTOS QUE TOMA SON COMO DE PROFESIONAL, ES SUPER COMODA DE TRABAJAR Y SUS OPCIONES SON MUY AMIGABLES, LA RECOMIENDO
